attributes.action: Change the law so that those adversely affected and damaged by an NHS employee are exempted, for the rest of their lives, from paying income tax.
attributes.additional_details: There are thousands of NHS employees who have devastated, in one way or another, the lives of hundreds of thousands of UK taxpayers through their failings in doing their job.  Since it seems impossible to remove pension and severance entitlements from these NHS criminals, the only respite must be that the people badly affected by those NHS employees MUST be exempted from contributing to the luxurious pension levels of those failed NHS employees, for the rest of their lives.
